block.cyclic.trash.guide: Deletes all items and fluids piped into it.
block.cyclic.trash.guide0: Warning! There's no undo button. Once the item's gone, it's gone.
block.cyclic.experience_pylon.guide: The Experience Pylon automatically collects nearby experience orbs and stores them as Fluid Experience in its internal buffer. $(l:misc/fluid_experience)Fluid Experience$(/l) can be pumped into and out of the pylon.$(br2)Additionally, the player may right click a filled Experience Pylon with a piece of Sugar to enrich it with experience, creating an $(l:misc/experience_food)Experience Confection$(/l).
item.cyclic.experience_food.tooltip: 對著經驗塔使用糖可獲得
item.cyclic.experience_food.guide: Created by using a piece of Sugar on a filled Experience Pylon. Eat the confection to gain the experience held within, or use it on an Experience Pylon to put experience back into the pylon.
item.cyclic.experience_food.guide0: Can also be created by combining Fluid Experience and Sugar in a $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l), and turned back into Fluid Experience in a $(l:machines/melter)Melting Chamber$(/l).
item.cyclic.crafting_stick.guide: Handheld crafting table.  Does not preserve its inventory
item.cyclic.crafting_bag.guide: Handheld crafting table with an inventory that is saved in itself like a backpack
block.cyclic.eye_teleport.tooltip: Look and crouch to teleport onto it
block.cyclic.eye_teleport.guide: Whenever a player is looking at this while crouching, the player is teleported on top of this block.  If solid blocks are above it, there is some leeway where you will appear above all of those blocks.  Same logic as $(l:items/teleport_wand)Ender Scepter$(/l).  Can cost hunger and experience based on config values.
block.cyclic.ghost.guide: While this block has redstone power, it is not selectable or breakable, and all entities pass through it.  It is also completely invisible.  Remove the power to break it.
block.cyclic.ghost_phantom.guide: While this block has redstone power, it is not selectable or breakable, and all entities pass through it.  Remove the power to break it.
block.cyclic.eye_redstone.tooltip: Redstone powered while a player is looking
block.cyclic.eye_redstone.guide: This block detects nearby players, and checks their eye position to see if the player is looking at the block.  Whenever its being looked at, the blockstate is updated and it produces redstone power.
block.cyclic.collector.guide: The Collector picks up nearby items and stores them in its internal buffer. Items can be taken directly out of the buffer, or piped out.
block.cyclic.cask.guide: The Cask is a small tank for storing fluids.$(br2)Fluids can be inserted and removed both by pipes and by buckets and other handheld fluid containers.
block.cyclic.flower_cyan.guide: A lost legacy from a lost version of Minecraft.  Spawns alone in biomes of Category (forest, plains, taiga, extreme hills).
block.cyclic.apple_sprout.guide: Plant below a leaf block to grow an apple.
block.cyclic.apple_sprout_emerald.guide: Plant below a leaf block to grow an emerald apple.
block.cyclic.apple_sprout_diamond.guide: Plant below a leaf block to grow a diamond apple.
block.cyclic.apple_sprout_chocolate.guid: Plant below a leaf block to grow an apple.
item.cyclic.scythe_harvest.guide: Harvest the area on use.  Sneak to harvest a smaller area.  Uses the same logic as the $(l:machines/harvester)Harvester$(/l) block.
item.cyclic.location.guide: Right click on a block with the GPS Marker in hand to save its position to the Marker.$(br2)Markers with saved locations can be used in multiple machines from this mod such as  $(l:machines/structure)Shape Builder$(/l) .
item.location.saved: 方塊位置已被保存，位置為：
block.cyclic.computer_shape.tooltip: Read buildings into a Shape Card
block.cyclic.computer_shape.guide: Place two  $(l:misc/location)GPS Card$(/l) cards and one  $(l:misc/shape_data)Shape Card$(/l), then you can read, copy, paste, and merge shapes together.
item.cyclic.shape_data.tooltip: Builds in-world after setup in a Shape Computer
item.cyclic.shape_data.guide: Place in a $(l:machines/computer_shape)Shape Computer$(/l) or a $(l:machines/structure)Shape Builder$(/l) to load with data, then click on a block to load its block
item.cyclic.shape_data.state: Empty block, select one with a click first
item.cyclic.shape_data.nothing: Card requires a shape and a selected block
item.cyclic.settings_data.guide: Copy settings between cyclic machines.  Hit on bedrock to wipe data clean.  After data is copied, can only be put onto blocks with the same id.
block.cyclic.terra_preta.tooltip: Place below farmland for sprinkler-like growth
block.cyclic.terra_preta.guide: Place Terra Preta below farmland to increase the speed at which crops grow.  Works just like a sprinkler except there are no particles, and it only targets the block above.
block.cyclic.crate.guide: The Crate is a container, like a chest, that is reinforced to survive explosions.
block.cyclic.dark_glass.tooltip: 能阻隔光照，且免疫爆炸和凋靈之首
block.cyclic.dark_glass.guide: Dark Glass, unlike regular glass, does not let light pass through.$(br2)Oh, and it's also immune explosions, including those caused by the Wither.
block.cyclic.soundproofing.tooltip: 每個方塊都能減輕周圍的聲音強度
block.cyclic.soundproofing.guide: Place to reduce the volume of nearby sounds in the world.$(br2)Multiple can be placed in close proximity for a stronger effect.
block.cyclic.fan.guide: The Fan is a configurable machine designed to push players, mobs, items and other entities.$(br2)Right-click on a fan to configure its range and speed.
block.cyclic.water_candle.tooltip: Light with Flint and Steel to increase mob spawns
block.cyclic.water_candle.guide: The Water Candle can be lit with Flint and Steel to increase the rate at which mobs naturally spawn nearby.$(br2)For the candle to work, mobs must be able to spawn naturally in its vicinity.$(br)In most cases, this means it must be dark enough to spawn mobs!
block.cyclic.water_candle.guide0: When lit, has a random chance to extinguish itself while spawning a mob. When this happens, you must relight the candle for it to continue spawning.
block.cyclic.unbreakable_block.tooltip: Right-click with Redstone to toggle Unbreakable state
block.cyclic.unbreakable_block.guide: Place in the world and then right-click with Redstone dust, Redstone Torch, or a Redstone Block in hand to toggle whether this block can be broken.
block.cyclic.unbreakable_reactive.toolti: Unbreakable while it has redstone power, can mine it otherwise
block.cyclic.unbreakable_reactive.guide: By default this can be mined as normal.  If it ever has a redstone signal given to it, then it becomes unbreakable by the block state. Unlike the other unbreakable block, this one uses a Tile Entity.
block.cyclic.conveyor.tooltip: Conveyor with many settings to move entities
block.cyclic.conveyor.guide: Moves all entities standing on it.   Many properties of this block are stored in the blockstate such as type, speed, and dye color.  Types include straight, corner, and up/down ramps.  To toggle the type, place in world and use the $(l:items/wrench)Wooden Wrench$(/l) on the placed rail, this toggles the type.
block.cyclic.conveyor.guide0: Hold a redstone torch and interact to toggle the speed.   Hold dye and use it on the block to toggle the color.  These updates propogate to nearby connected rails.  (check F3 to view these properties in detail)
block.cyclic.ender_shelf.guide: Can be used standalone or as part of a multiblock structure with at least one $(l:blocks/ender_controller)Ender Shelf Controller$(/l). Each shelf has 5 slots that you can right click on to insert an Enchanted Book for storage.
block.cyclic.ender_shelf.guide0: Enchanted Books must have just one enchantment to be inserted. Use a $(l:machines/disenchanter)Disenchanter$(/l) to strip books down to single enchantments if necessary.
block.cyclic.ender_controller.guide: When combined with at least one $(l:blocks/ender_shelf)Ender Shelf$(/l), allows for automated insertion/extraction of Enchanted books.
block.cyclic.workbench.tooltip: A Crafting Table that keeps its inventory when closed
block.cyclic.workbench.guide: A simple Crafting Table that keeps its inventory when closed.
item.cyclic.flippers.guide: When worn, Flippers increase the player's swim speed.$(br2)Can be equipped as an accessory if the Curios mod is installed.
item.cyclic.glove_climb.tooltip: 能攀登任何的垂直平面，它必須放在你的快捷欄或非慣用手欄才能生效
item.cyclic.glove_climb.guide: When worn, Climbing Gloves allow the player to climb vertical surfaces as if a ladder or vines were present.$(br2)Can be equipped as an accessory if the Curios mod is installed.
block.cyclic.breaker.tooltip: Breaks blocks placed in front of it
block.cyclic.breaker.guide: Breakers can be used to break the block placed directly in front of it, like a player would.$(br2)Breakers do not have internal item storage, so the broken block will drop itself (or its loot) in the world to be picked up.
item.cyclic.wrench.guide: The Wrench can be used to rotate simple blocks such as stairs, slabs and ladders. Does not rotate machines.
item.cyclic.cable_wrench.guide: Use the Cable Wrench by right-clicking on a Cyclic $(l:machines/pipe)cable$(/l) to change the cable's settings. Left-click any block with the wrench to change the wrench's mode.
item.cyclic.build_scepter.guide: The Building Scepter is a powerful tool that comes in three forms - Fill, Place, and Exchange.$(br2)For each, left clicking on any block will change the size of the area that will be affected. Sneak-left-clicking will select the block to be placed by the scepter. Right-click with the scepter to place or exchange blocks from your inventory.
item.cyclic.build_scepter.guide0: $(li)The Fill Scepter places blocks in the specified-shape around the block you right-click on.$(li)The Exchange Scepter swaps all blocks with your selected block in a shape around the block you right-click.$(li)The Place Scepter is similar to the Fill Scepter, except the blocks are placed on the surface of the block you right-click.
item.cyclic.randomize_scepter.tooltip: 在目標區塊周圍的5x5x1區域內隨機移動
button.filter.ignoredamage1.tooltip: 忽略物品耐久值，只匹配物品ID
button.build.first.tooltip: 從左到右檢測魔杖物品欄內可以被放置的方塊
button.build.random.tooltip: 隨機使用魔杖物品欄內的方塊
button.build.rotate.tooltip: 按順序逐個使用魔杖物品欄內的方塊
button.harvester.mode.tooltip: 範圍收割會消耗較多的燃料來同時收割一大片的作物
button.inventory.hotbarswap: 與整行快捷欄交換物品
button.reset.tooltip: 將預設放置格復位到第一格
button.rotations.up: 增加要轉動（階梯等）方塊的次數
button.rotations.down: 減少要轉動（階梯等）方塊的次數
button.waypoint.dimension: 只有在以下維度時才可用：
command.cyclic.arguments.null: 第二個參數必須是有效的循環指令：
command.cyclic.gethome.bed: 你家的床不見了或被擋住了
command.cyclic.home.nether: You must be in The Nether to teleport to your Respawn Anchor
command.cyclic.home.obstructed: Your respawn point is missing or obstructed
command.cyclic.searchitem.none: 在搜尋半徑內找不到任何項目
command.cyclic.searchtrade.none: 附近村民沒有找到匹配的交易
enchantment.cyclic.excavate.desc: 挖掘所有連接著的相同方塊（類似於連鎖挖礦），對角線上的礦物無法連鎖（請不要使用有這個附魔的工具挖掘石頭等連接非常多的方塊）
enchantment.cyclic.multishot.desc: 可以一次從弓中射出更多的箭
enchantment.cyclic.beheading.guide: 這個附魔讓你有機會得到一個怪物或一個玩家的頭。如果需要，來自其他Mod的生物可以被加入到配置檔案中，並且需要一個玩家外觀來作為頭的外觀。
enchantment.cyclic.beheading.desc: 這個附魔讓你有機會得到一個怪物或一個玩家的頭。如果需要，來自其他Mod的生物可以被加入到配置檔案中，並且需要一個玩家外觀來作為頭的外觀。
enchantment.cyclic.experience_boost.desc: 增加你採礦或殺死生物所獲得的經驗
enchantment.cyclic.growth.guide: Grow nearby crops while held.  Can be applied to Hoe tools only.
enchantment.cyclic.launch.desc: 附魔給靴子後，可以增加多段跳（二段跳等）的能力。每一級增加一段跳，但有冷卻時間。潛行跳躍可以臨時取消該能力。
enchantment.cyclic.launch.guide: Gives you the power of multi jump (double jump) when enchanted on boots.  One extra jump per level, after that cooldown kicks in; sneak to jump normally.
enchantment.cyclic.life_leech.desc: 吸血在攻擊時從你的目標身上獲得生命值，在殺死時獲得更多。
enchantment.cyclic.life_leech.guide: Leeches life points from your target on attack, and even more on kill.  Can only apply to weapons only (swords).
enchantment.cyclic.magnet.desc: 使你擁有吸引地面掉落物和經驗的能力
enchantment.cyclic.magnet.guide: Makes you magnetic for item stacks and experience on the ground.  Magnet only triggers while item is held/equipped.  Can apply to anything.
enchantment.cyclic.quickshot.desc: 使你拉滿弓的速度提高三倍。
enchantment.cyclic.quickshot.guide: This triples the speed that your bow draws up to full power.  Higher levels further increase draw speed.  Applies to regular bows, not crossbows.
enchantment.cyclic.reach.desc: 增加你挖掘或放置方塊的距離
enchantment.cyclic.reach.guide: Increases your building and mining reach.  Can apply to chestplate armor or Elytra
enchantment.cyclic.step.desc: 使你能夠自動走上一格高的方塊
enchantment.cyclic.step.guide: Increases your step height to a full block similar to horses.  Can apply to leg armor only
enchantment.cyclic.traveler.desc: 防止意外受傷（鞘翅、終界珍珠、仙人掌、蜜蜂、墜落）
enchantment.cyclic.traveler.guide: Protects against exploration hazards (elytra, ender pearls, cacti, bees, fall resistance).  Can apply to leg armor only
enchantment.cyclic.venom.guide: Inflicts the poison status effect on the target.  Can apply to swords only
enchantment.cyclic.auto_smelt.desc: Smelts whatever you harvest with this tool.
enchantment.cyclic.auto_smelt.guide: Smelts whatever you harvest with this tool.  Can apply to mining tools such as axes, shovels, pickaxes.  Not compatible with fortune or silk touch
enchantment.cyclic.disarm.desc: Chance to disarm opponent on hit.
enchantment.cyclic.disarm.guide: Chance to disarm opponent on hit.  Can apply to swords only
enchantment.cyclic.curse.desc: Chance to apply negative status effects to enemy when hit. Chance does not stack with multiple enchanted items.
enchantment.cyclic.curse.guide: Chance to apply negative status effects to enemy when hit. Chance does not stack with multiple enchanted items.  Can apply to any armor piece
enchantment.cyclic.ender.desc: Throws an Ender Pearl with your sword, consuming durability. Cooldown decreases with level.
enchantment.cyclic.ender.guide: Throws an Ender Pearl with your sword, consuming durability. Cooldown decreases with level.  Can apply to swords only
enchantment.cyclic.beekeeper.desc: Protection against thorny and flying damage.
enchantment.cyclic.beekeeper.guide: Protection against thorny and flying damage.  First level prevent bee, bat, and llama spit damage.  Level II or higher prevents phantom damage.
fluid.cyclic.biomass.guide: Combine solid $(l:misc/biomass)Biomass$(/l) with various organic material in a $(l:machines/metler)Melter$(/l) to create Fluid Biomass.
fluid.cyclic.honey.guide: Fluid Honey can be extracted from honey byproducts in a $(l:machines/melter)Melting Chamber$(/l) and is used in a $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l).
fluid.cyclic.magma.guide: Fluid Magma can be extracted from Magma Blocks or Magma Cream in a $(l:machines/melter)Melting Chamber$(/l) and is used in a $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l).
fluid.cyclic.slime.guide: Fluid Slime can be extracted from Slimeballs or Slime Blocks in a $(l:machines/melter)Melting Chamber$(/l) and is used in a $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l).
fluid.cyclic.xpjuice.guide: Fluid Experience is created and used by the $(l:machines/experience_pylon)Experience Pylon$(/l).
gui.enderbook.back.tooltip: 回到你傳送前的位置，此位置的保存時間為（秒）：
gui.enderbook.title: 終界之書傳送點
guide.category.accessories.desc: These accessories all provide passive abilities to the player; and do not need to be held in the hand or activated.  They are all supported by the Curios mod if installed.
guide.category.blocks.desc: These are all the simple (non-machine) blocks in Cyclic.
guide.category.consume.desc: These are single use items; either consumed by the player or a targeted creature.
guide.category.machines.desc: Machines are active tile-entity blocks.  They usually have an inventory screen, and consume consume energy or fluids.
guide.category.enchantments.desc: Enchantments can all be applied normally through anvils or enchanting tables.
guide.category.gear.desc: Basic equipment such as armor, tools, and swords.
guide.category.misc.desc: Items that don't fit into other categories.
guide.category.items.desc: All these tools have a unique purpose.  Most are tools that can be used many times and are not consumeable.  Many take durability damage as they get used.
guide.category.potions.desc: Potions can all be brewed normally in a brewing stand based on awkward base potions.
guide.title: Cyclic 指南
item.book_ender.guide: 一本神奇的書，它可以將您目前的位置存儲為傳送點。根據距離消耗相對數量的經驗（可配置）傳送到設定好的傳送點。不能跨維度傳送，但它可以在任何維度存儲傳送點。
item.cantoggle.tooltip.info: 在物品欄右擊以開關，目前狀態：
item.cantoggle.guide: Right click this item in your inventory to toggle it on or off.
item.iscurios.guide: If the Curios mod is installed, this item can be worn as an accessory.
item.cyclic.carbon_paper.tooltip: 複製標牌內容，在鍋釜上清洗
item.cyclic.carbon_paper.guide: Carbon Paper can be used to copy the contents of one sign to another. The copied text can be cleaned off of the Carbon Paper by using it on a Cauldron.
item.cyclic.antigravity.guide: When active, you can jump without falling at the expense of durability while you remain in the air.
item.cyclic.charm_antidote.guide: When in your inventory or worn as an accessory, protects you from poison at the expense of durability.
item.cyclic.charm_wither.guide: When in your inventory or worn as an accessory, protects you from the Wither status effect at the expense of durability.
item.cyclic.charm_ultimate.tooltip: 免疫中毒、凋零、火焰效果，且同時具有虛空飾品的防虛空效果。
item.cyclic.charm_ultimate.guide: When in your inventory or worn as an accessory, combines the protection effects of the $(l:accessories/charm_antidote)Antidote Charm$(/l), $(l:accessories/charm_wither)Wither Charm$(/l), $(l:accessories/charm_fire)Fire Charm$(/l), and $(l:accessories/charm_void)Void Charm$(/l).
item.charm_boat.guide: 提高你的划船速度。在你的物品欄中右擊該物品可以關閉它，相容Baubles API。
item.charm_boat.tooltip: 攜帶時可以提高船的行駛速度
item.cyclic.charm_fire.tooltip: 攜帶時能提供抗火效果
item.cyclic.charm_fire.guide: When in your inventory or worn as an accessory, protects you from fire damage at the expense of durability.
item.charm_speed.guide: 給你一個被動的速度提升效果，可以搭配速度藥水。在你的物品欄中右擊該物品可以關閉它，它相容Baubles API，並且可以在鐵砧中修復。
item.charm_speed.tooltip: 加快你和你的坐騎的速度
item.cyclic.charm_void.guide: 這個飾品可以拯救你掉進虛空的慘案，可以將其放置在你的物品欄或者Baubles裝飾欄中。它會在檢測到你已跌落到$0格以下時立即將你傳送到天上。
item.cyclic.charm_void.tooltip: 拯救不慎掉進虛空的慘案
item.charm_water.guide: 在氧氣耗盡後會提供水下呼吸的效果。在你的物品欄中右擊該物品可以關閉它，相容Baubles API。
item.charm_wing.guide: 讓你免疫掉落傷害。當你掉落的距離超過6格時，它會給予你一個緩落的效果，就像降落傘一樣。在你的物品欄中右擊該物品可以關閉它，相容Baubles API。
item.charm_wing.tooltip: 魔法降落傘（在距離地面6格時獲得緩落效果）
item.cyclic.tile_transporter.tooltip: 容器內占用的物品格數：
item.cyclic.tile_transporter.guide: Right click on any machine or container with the Sack of Holding to pick it up.$(br2)Right click on any block with a filled Sack of Holding to place the machine again.
item.corrupted_chorus.guide: 吃了這個，你就可以穿過牆壁幾秒鐘。如果你在時間耗盡後還在牆上，它會將你傳送回到吃掉它的地方。且會給你帶來一些負面效果。
item.crafting_food.guide: 將物品欄中2x2的合成表永久解鎖為3x3。解鎖後，你可以使用綁定的按鍵或物品欄中的按鍵打開它。
item.crafting_food.tooltip: 吃掉後可以在物品欄中使用3*3的工作檯合成欄
item.cyclic_wand.shifting: 潛行時滾動游標滾輪以切換魔杖模式
item.cyclic_wand_build.guide: 高級的遠程建築工具。有一個用於改變方向的自訂HUD（潛行+滾動游標滾輪改變），在它的物品欄中放入要建築的方塊。它具有不同的建築模式：隨機，標準和逐個。
item.dropper_minecart.guide: 裝載了投擲器的礦車。當經過觸發鐵軌時會投擲一次物品。
item.dropper_minecart.tooltip: 當行駛到觸發鐵軌上時會投擲一次物品
item.dynamite_mining.guide: 它會創造一個強力的爆炸，但不會傷害玩家或生物。爆炸會破壞方塊，但它不像常規的爆炸，它炸毀方塊時會百分百掉落方塊，所以你可以用它來採礦。
item.dynamite_mining.tooltip: 爆炸後百分百掉落炸掉的方塊的炸藥，不會傷害任何生物。
item.dynamite_safe.guide: 它會造成一個強力的爆炸，不會破壞方塊，但會傷害生物。
item.dynamite_safe.tooltip: 不會破壞方塊或傷害玩家（但會傷害非玩家生物）
item.cyclic.emerald_gear.guide: Equipment and armor made from Emeralds. Stronger than diamond equipment.
item.cyclic.ender_eye_reuse.tooltip: 用於尋找要塞的、可重複使用的終界之眼
item.cyclic.ender_eye_reuse.guide: Reuseable Ender Eye for finding strongholds. Can be thrown multiple times and will not break.
item.cyclic.fire_scepter.tooltip: 射出燃燒敵人的火焰魔法
item.cyclic.fire_scepter.guide: Launch three projectiles that burn and damage entities.  Does not set fire to the world.
item.cyclic.spawner_seeker.notfound: 附近沒有生怪箱，其探測範圍為
item.cyclic.spawner_seeker.found: 已找到生怪箱，正在準備發射...
item.cyclic.spawner_seeker.guide: The Spawner Seeker can be used to find the nearest spawner to your current location.
item.cyclic.lightning_scepter.guide: Launch a projectile that will spawn a natural lightning bolt when it lands.
item.cyclic.ender_pearl_mounted.tooltip: 將你帶向目的地的、可重複使用的終界珍珠
item.cyclic.ender_pearl_mounted.guide: An enhanced Ender Pearl that also carries the user when thrown.
item.cyclic.ender_pearl_reuse.tooltip: 可重複使用的終界珍珠
item.cyclic.ender_pearl_reuse.guide: An Ender Pearl that can be thrown, picked up, and thrown again.
item.cyclic.ice_scepter.tooltip: 射出的冰會使敵人眩暈
item.cyclic.ice_scepter.guide: Launch three frozen projectiles that applies the  $(l:potions/stun)paralyze$(/l) potion effect to all enemies
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_1.guide: 投擲它以產生爆炸。它有六種不同的威力級別。這些炸藥造成的爆炸都是沒有特別之處的普通爆炸。
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_3.guide: 爆炸威力與爬行者相同
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_3.tooltip: 爆炸威力與爬行者相同
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_4.guide: 爆炸威力為高壓爬行者的1/3，也相當於一個TNT的爆炸威力
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_4.tooltip: 爆炸威力為高壓爬行者的1/3，也相當於一個TNT的爆炸威力
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_5.guide: 爆炸威力為高壓爬行者的2/3
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_5.tooltip: 爆炸威力為高壓爬行者的2/3
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_6.guide: 爆炸威力與高壓爬行者相同；也相當於一個終界水晶的爆炸威力
item.cyclic.ender_tnt_6.tooltip: 爆炸威力與高壓爬行者相同；也相當於一個終界水晶的爆炸威力
item.cyclic.ender_torch.guide: 一個可投擲的火把。它能在世界內的著陸點上方放置一個火把。
item.cyclic.ender_water.guide: 蒸發附近的流體，有三種蒸發模式：水，熔岩，普通流體
item.cyclic.ender_wool.guide: 向一群羊投擲它以遠程剪羊毛。與普通剪刀相比，用它剪下的羊毛有少許掉落加成。
item.cyclic.evoker_fang.tooltip: 使出喚魔者刌民擁有的秘密魔法
item.cyclic.evoker_fang.guide: 在你的前方召喚一排筆直朝前的喚魔者尖牙。必須對著實體或者方塊使用。
item.cyclic.fire_dark.guide: 不會點燃玩家或者破壞方塊。
item.cyclic.food_step.guide: 吃下以後你就可以直接走上一格高的方塊（再次吃下可去除這個效果）
item.cyclic.food_step.tooltip: 吃下以後你就可以直接走上一格高的方塊（再次吃下可去除這個效果）
item.cyclic.glowing_chorus.guide: 用比較平衡的方式來獲得飛行的力量。在吃下之後能給予你幾分鐘（可堆疊）的創造飛行時間。可使用牛奶來移除該效果。
item.cyclic.glowing_chorus.tooltip: 給你幾分鐘（可堆疊）的飛行時間，在飛行時間內可以像在創造模式那樣飛行。
item.cyclic.glowing_helmet.tooltip: 在穿戴時給予夜視效果
item.cyclic.glowing_helmet.guide: 在穿戴時給予夜視效果，在你的物品欄中右擊該物品可以關閉它（在大多數物品欄介面都正常工作）
item.cyclic.heart.guide: When consumed, grants the player 1 permanent, extra heart. Multiple can be consumed for additional hearts.  Config file specifies the maximum number of hearts allowed, default is 20.
item.cyclic.heart_empty.guide: When consumed, permanently removes 1 heart from the player but grants a hefty dose of experience for your loss.$(br)Be careful! You can reduce your hearts permanently down to just one if you keep eating these.
item.cyclic.apple_chocolate.guide: Similar to milk, when eaten it clears out potion effects.  However it only removes harmful ones like poison, and not beneficial ones such as regeneration or night vision.
item.cyclic.apple_honey.guide: Rich food that has no effects.  Used for crafting.
item.cyclic.apple_diamond.guide: 60 seconds worth of Resistance V and health boost V for short tough fights
item.cyclic.apple_lapis.guide: Utility buffs include swim speed, conduit, water breathing, night vision.
item.cyclic.apple_iron.guide: Lower levels of health boost and resistance
item.cyclic.apple_emerald.guide: Exlorative buffs include haste, luck, slow falling.
item.cyclic.carrot_ender.guide: Give your horse some magic shields.  These trigger when the mount is drowning, falling, burning, or low on health.  When triggered, it will consume one tick of the count and buff the mount accordingly.
item.cyclic.toxic_carrot.guide: Use the Toxic Carrot on a horse to turn it into a Zombie Horse.
item.cyclic.diamond_carrot_health.guide: Use the Diamond Carrot on a horse to increase its max health.$(br2)Multiple can be used to increase the horse's max health even more.
item.cyclic.redstone_carrot_speed.guide: Use the Redstone Carrot on a horse to increase its top sped.$(br2)Multiple can be used to increase the top speed even more.
item.cyclic.emerald_carrot_jump.guide: Use the Emerald Carrot on a horse to increase its jump height.$(br2)Multiple can be used to increase the jump height even more.
item.cyclic.lapis_carrot_variant.guide: Use the Lapis Carrot on a horse to change its coat to a different variant.$(br2)Keep using additional Lapis Carrots until you find the coat you're looking for.
item.inventory_food.guide: 吃下這個將為您解鎖兩個新的控制按鍵和一個類似終界箱的擴展存儲空間，你可以將其當作一個儲存介面或交換物品欄物品的一堆實用按鈕使用。
item.inventory_food.tooltip: 吃掉後，可以在物品欄中打開一個類似終界箱的擴展存儲空間
item.cyclic.magic_net.tooltip: 對著一個生物實體投擲以捕捉它
item.cyclic.magic_net.guide: The Monster Ball can be thrown at a creature to capture it. The creature will remain in the ball until you right-click a block with the Monster Ball in hand to release it.$(br2)An easier alternative to transporting mobs with leashes or minecarts.
item.cyclic.mob_container.tooltip: 生成被生物捕捉球捕捉的生物
item.cyclic.mattock.tooltip: 相當於鐵鎬和鐵鏟的結合體。一次能挖掘3x3x1的方塊
item.cyclic.mattock.guide: 一次能挖掘3x3的泥土類和石頭類方塊。
item.cyclic.lever_remote.tooltip: 將它綁定到世界上的一個控制桿（Shift+右擊），便可以遠端遙控控制桿
item.cyclic.lever_remote.guide: 將其與控制桿潛行右擊綁定後，便可以在其所在區塊已被載入時遠端遙控控制桿（無視距離與維度）。
item.cyclic.lever_remote.invalid: 該位置無效，因為沒有找到控制桿
chunk.unloaded: 無法實施該動作；其所在區塊未載入
item.cyclic.crystal_gear.guide: Crystallized Obsidian gear is very strong (and very expensive as a result). Much stronger than Netherite gear.
item.cyclic.ender_bag.guide: The Ender Bag provides a portable interface to your Ender Chest. Anything you store in your Ender Chest inventory can be accessed via the Ender Bag, and vice versa.
item.cyclic.sandstone_gear.guide: The sandstone tools are slightly below stone quality but better than wood.
item.cyclic.sandstone_gear.title: Sandstone Gear
item.cyclic.sleeping_mat.guide: 它可以讓你在你站立的地方直接睡覺。可以在配置中設定藥水的結果。
item.cyclic.sleeping_mat.trying: 你正在嘗試站著睡覺，不要移動……
item.cyclic.sleeping_mat.tooltip.info: 在物品欄右擊以設定是否設定出生點，目前模式：
item.cyclic.soulstone.guide: 一次性物品。可以挽救你的一次死亡。類似不死圖騰，但兩者不會相互衝突。它並不像不死圖騰需要放在快捷欄才能生效，它放在物品欄時就可以生效了。當生效時，你會恢復3顆心的生命，並獲得一些正面效果以及10分鐘的虛弱II和霉運效果。
item.cyclic.soulstone.tooltip: 攜帶時可以挽救你的一次死亡。免洗用品。
item.cyclic.sprout_seed.guide: 一株能生長的魔法植物，收穫成熟的魔豆後會隨機掉落垃圾或寶藏。
item.cyclic.sprout_seed.tooltip: 收穫後隨機掉落垃圾和寶藏
item.cyclic.stone_minecart.guide: 類似於只有一個格子的儲物箱，覆石礦車可以攜帶任何方塊，用要存入的方塊右擊它存儲，空手右擊取出方塊（也適用於自動玩家模擬器）。當經過被啟動的觸發鐵軌時會彈出運載的方塊。
item.cyclic.stone_minecart.tooltip: 只能攜帶一個方塊，經過被啟動的觸發鐵軌時彈出方塊
item.cyclic.storage_bag.tooltip: 已占用袋子物品欄格數：
item.cyclic.storage_bag.guide: 一個攜帶式的儲物箱。可以在GUI中設定左擊容器時的搬運模式和改變該物品的顏色。
item.cyclic.storage_bag.guide0: To change the color of your bag, first open it, pickup some Dye with your mouse, and place it on top of the bag.  This will not consume the dye or move the bag, but it will set the bag item color.
item.cyclic.storage_bag.disabled: 與存儲器的互動已被停用，請在GUI中設定搬運模式
item.cyclic.storage_bag.pickup.filter: 目前收納模式：只自動收納被撿起物品中與袋子內物品相同的物品
item.cyclic.storage_bag.pickup.everythin: 目前收納模式：自動收納一切被撿起的物品
item.cyclic.sword_ender.guide: 不可破壞的劍，右擊可以發射一顆終界珍珠
item.cyclic.sword_ender.tooltip: 右擊可以發射一顆終界珍珠
item.cyclic.sword_slowness.tooltip: 右擊可以發射一瓶緩慢藥水
item.cyclic.sword_slowness.guide: 堅不可摧的劍，右擊可以發射一瓶緩慢藥水
item.cyclic.sword_weakness.tooltip: 右擊可以發射一瓶虛弱藥水
item.cyclic.sword_weakness.guide: 堅不可摧的劍，右擊可以發射一瓶虛弱藥水
item.cyclic.charm_torch.tooltip: 在黑暗的地方消耗耐久自動放置火把
item.cyclic.charm_torch.guide: 每當發現你所處的位置太黑時，它就會在那裡消耗一些耐久來放置一個火把。在物品欄右擊該物品可以關閉它。
item.cyclic.charm_torch_cave.tooltip: Torches your surroundings while in your inventory
item.cyclic.charm_torch_cave.guide: Detects darkness in an area around you and places torches where necessary, draining some durability.  Right click in your inventory to turn it off.
item.tool_harvest_crops.tooltip: 大面積地收割並重新種植作物
item.tool_harvest_crops.guide: 類似於收割機，用其右擊會收穫作用範圍內的作物並重新種植。
item.cyclic.scythe_forage.tooltip: 基於數據標籤收割可生長資源
item.cyclic.scythe_forage.guide: Forage growing resources based on data tags
item.cyclic.scythe_leaves.guide: Harvests all nearby leaves on use
item.cyclic.scythe_brush.tooltip: 基於數據標籤掃平草和花
item.cyclic.scythe_brush.guide: Harvest weeds and flowers based on data tag.
item.tool_launcher.tooltip: 拿著彈跳之杖按住右擊，鬆開可以向前/後跳躍一段距離
item.tool_launcher.guide: 按住右擊對著一個方向，鬆開後，它能將你發射出去。有兩種模式（向前發射和向後發射），你可以透過左鍵單擊任意方塊切換。向前意味著你必須瞄準空氣，並能控制發射後著陸的地點和角度。向後意味著你必須瞄準地面才能向後發射。強烈推薦配合彈跳藥水使用，它會讓你在地面上非常快速地彈射移動（就像在史萊姆方塊上一樣）。
item.tool_mount.guide: 你可以對著任何生物使用，使用後可以騎在任何生物上。但是怪物仍然能攻擊到你，而且你無法對騎著的生物進行控制。
item.cyclic.stirrups.tooltip: 騎乘任何生物實體（沒有鞍將無法控制）
item.cyclic.stirrups.guide: Mount any entity (without the control of the saddle)
item.cyclic.mount_inverse.tooltip: 用它右擊一個實體，實體就會騎在你的頭上。再次右擊可以放下實體。
item.cyclic.mount_inverse.guide: 用它右擊一個實體，實體就會騎在你的頭上。再次右擊可以放下實體。
item.cyclic.prospector.guide: 搜尋並顯示你點擊的方塊後方的礦石。它能列出準確的探礦結果。如果你點擊一個方塊的頂部，它會向下搜尋，如果你點擊其中一個面，它會向那個面的後方搜尋。它只會搜尋一條直線上的礦石。此外，它還有一個可設定的黑名單來忽略某些常見的方塊。
item.cyclic.prospector.tooltip: 探測一條直線上的礦石
item.cyclic.push.guide: 此工具有三種模式：推，拉，旋轉。使用攻擊鍵（左鍵點擊）改變模式。推動和拉動類似於活塞移動方塊，前提是移動的方向上是空氣方塊；並且還能在保留數據的情況下移動實體方塊（大儲物箱/熔爐等）。旋轉模式將嘗試在其定位的軸上旋轉方塊，例如調整原木的面朝方向，或調整半磚和階梯的方向。
item.cyclic.randomize.guide: 將對工作範圍內的方塊進行隨機打亂放置。用來幫助你改變你牆的材質。使用攻擊鍵（左鍵單擊）來變更作用範圍。它會影響著你所擊中的任何一個平面區域。儲物箱等有資訊的實體方塊將會被忽略。
item.cyclic.randomize.tooltip: 隨機擺放作用範圍內的方塊。左鍵單擊以調整作用範圍。
item.cyclic.rotate.guide: 它會嘗試在不改變材質類型的同時旋轉目標方塊。它會將一個原木改變為不同的朝向，但不會把橡木變成杉木。它不僅適用於原版可以獲得的方塊，也可以用來獲得原版無法獲得的方塊，如雙半磚方塊，平滑的砂岩，和在六面上都是樹皮材質的木材。
item.cyclic.rotate.tooltip: 旋轉能旋轉的方塊/機器
item.cyclic.spawn_inspect.empty: 這裡沒有什麼可生成的生物
item.cyclic.spawn_inspect.guide: 告訴你你指向的方塊上可以自然生成哪些生物，無視生怪箱。可以被用於製作史萊姆、女巫和凋零骷髏農場。
item.cyclic.spawn_inspect.tooltip: 檢測某處會自然生成的生物（包括Mod生物、史萊姆以及凋零骷髏）
item.cyclic.spelunker.guide: 單擊一個方塊，它將探測這個方塊在一條直線的區域內是否有中空空間（空氣或流體），如果你點擊方塊上方將會探測下方，點擊方塊的一個側面將會探測後方。對於尋找洞穴，探險和挖礦有很大幫助。
item.cyclic.torch_launcher.tooltip: 在它發射的火把著陸之地放置火把
item.cyclic.torch_launcher.guide: The Torch Launcher shoots a torch with considerable force in the direction you are facing, placing the torch wherever it lands.$(br2)Automatically consumes torches in your inventory to refill itself.
item.cyclic.trade.tooltip: 從相距最近的村民那裡打開一個改進的交易介面
item.cyclic.trade.guide: 可以在村民附近使用的高級交易選單。具有每次點擊執行一次交易的方便特性。完全尊重了原版村民的交易機制。
item.cyclic.charm_home.tooltip: 將你傳送到你的個人重生點（床的位置）
item.cyclic.charm_home.guide: Warps you back home at cost of durability. If you have an active Respawn Anchor in the Nether and you are currently in the Nether, you will be teleported there.$(br2)Otherwise, you will be teleported to your bed if you are in the Overworld and you have slept in a bed to set your respawn point.
item.cyclic.charm_world.tooltip: 將你傳送到世界出生點（初始出生點）
item.cyclic.charm_world.guide: 消耗耐久來將你傳送到世界出生點。
item.wand_hypno.guide: 迷惑附近的敵對生物，使它們相互攻擊
item.wand_hypno.tooltip: 迷惑附近的敵對生物，使它們相互攻擊
item.wand_missile.guide: 對附近的敵對生物發射追蹤導彈
item.wand_missile.tooltip: 對附近的敵對生物發射追蹤導彈
item.cyclic.spell_ice.guide: 消耗耐久將附近的水塊轉成冰塊。
item.cyclic.spell_water.tooltip: 將流動的水替換為靜態水源
item.cyclic.spell_water.guide: 將流動的水轉變為水源，可以方便快速的填滿湖泊和河流。
item.cyclic.teleport_wand.tooltip: Teleports where you look, using Ender Pearls as fuel
item.cyclic.teleport_wand.guide: The Ender Scepter when held and charged, can be used to teleport large distances to the block that you're looking at. Automatically consumes Ender Pearls in your inventory to repair itself.
item.cyclic.elevation_wand.tooltip: Teleport yourself or the target entity up to the nearest surface above
item.cyclic.elevation_wand.guide: Teleporter that works only vertically, and only if it can find an empty space with a surface above.  Works on yourself, or target another entity.
item.cyclic.antimatter_wand.guide: Left-click to cycle between Water, Lava, and Generic Fluid modes. Right-click to clear a 9x9 area of the selected fluid type from the world.
key.keyExtraCraftin: 打開攜帶式工作檯（如果已解鎖）
key.keyExtraInvo: 打開擴展物品欄（如果已解鎖）
key.keyWheel: 打開擴展物品欄交換介面（如果已解鎖）
block.cyclic.trash.warning: 警告！這將刪除所有物品！
block.cyclic.crafter.tooltip: 使用3x3合成表的自動合成器
block.cyclic.crafter.guide: Set the recipe, and this will autocraft as many as it can.  Input slots are on the left slots, outputs on the right.  Also works with pipes/cables/hoppers for input and output
block.cyclic.beacon.tooltip: Use potions to generate beacon effects
block.cyclic.beacon.guide: The Pharos Beacon takes power and potions as input and automatically applies potion effects to the selected type of entity in a radius around itself.$(br2)Can target players, mobs, animals, etc.
block.cyclic.beacon_redstone.guide: 給予紅石信號時顯示烽火台光束
block.cyclic.beacon_redstone.tooltip: 給予紅石信號時顯示烽火台光束
block.cyclic.disenchanter.tooltip: 以一個比較廉價的過程將已經附魔的物品還原為物品和附魔書
block.cyclic.disenchanter.guide: The Disenchanter can take an enchantment off of an item and apply it to a book. Only one enchantment is stripped at a time, so items with multiple enchantments will need to be disenchanted multiple times.
block.cyclic.anvil.guide: The Powered Diamond Anvil repairs equipment using Energy
block.cyclic.anvil_magma.guide: The Magma Anvil repairs equipment using liquid Magma.  Pipe it in from a tank or something else
block.cyclic.enchanter.tooltip: 消耗能量和液態經驗來附魔
block.cyclic.enchanter.guide: 以經驗流體的形式通入經驗，並通入能量或者放入燃料便可以附魔。可以透過管道和漏斗自動化。
block.cyclic.fisher.tooltip: 用魚竿在附近的水裡釣魚
block.cyclic.fisher.guide: Place near water and give it a fishing rod and it will automatically catch fish.$(br2)Caught fish will be dropped in the world and need to be picked up manually or by other machines.
block.cyclic.scaffold.guide.title: Scaffolding
block.cyclic.scaffold.guide: Scaffolding is a cheap, easy to break block that can be used when building. All Scaffolding can be placed in mid-air and climbed like a ladder.
block.cyclic.scaffold_fragile.tooltip: 在放置一段時間後會變成掉落物，可以浮空放置。
block.cyclic.scaffold_responsive.tooltip: 破壞一個連結鷹架相鄰的連結鷹架也會被破壞（不管相鄰多少，破壞掉後只會掉落一個鷹架）；可以浮空放置。
block.cyclic.scaffold_responsive.guide: Breaks itself all in a line when you break the adjacent one.
block.cyclic.scaffold_replace.tooltip: 可以拿著其他的方塊右擊來替換它；可以浮空放置。
block.cyclic.scaffold_replace.guide: Use a block on this to replace it.
block.cyclic.tank.tooltip: 存儲多達64桶的任何流體，可以上下疊加
block.cyclic.tank.guide: The Fluid Storage Tank is the big brother of the $(l:blocks/cask)Cask$(/l), able to store more fluid in a single block.
block.cyclic.user.tooltip: 自主模擬玩家操作，可以使用物品
block.cyclic.user.guide: The Item User is a powerful machine that uses the item given to it to right click the block in front of it with a configurable delay.
enchantment_stack.empty: 目前為空；使用一本附魔書來儲存附魔
block.cyclic.screen.tooltip: 能以任何顏色顯示文字資訊的畫面
block.cyclic.screen.guide: 類似8行而不是4行的告示牌。使用RGB值來設定顏色，並輸入你需要的文本
block.cyclic.screen_target.guide: 使用GPS定位器來定位方塊，你可以選擇顯示流體、能量、或物品內容
button.pulsing.tooltip: 點擊以切換雷射旋轉動畫
button.extending.tooltip: 點擊以切換雷射發射動畫
block.cyclic.library_ctrl.tooltip: 可以用終界圖書館與其連接的終界書櫃進行互動
block.cyclic.library_ctrl.guide: 終界書櫃的控制器。可以將附魔輕鬆存入附近的終界書櫃。在其周圍放置終界書櫃以讓它連接並安放附魔書，可以透過管道對其泵入附魔書和取出書來自動化。
block.cyclic.library.tooltip: 有四個可以存儲大量同種附魔的格子抽屜
block.cyclic.library.guide: 拿著附魔書對著邊上的格子右擊來將附魔存儲到書櫃中。每個格子只能存儲一種附魔，然後可以拿著書對著已經存儲的附魔右擊來取出。另外，拿著紅石火把點擊它還可以改變它的顯示模式。
block.builder_pattern.flip: 切換來源和目標區域（紫色是來源區，白色是要複製的目標區）
block.builder_pattern.guide: 這種先進的建築機器幾乎可以複製任何形式的建築。選定兩個相鄰的相同大小和形狀的區域，並給它材料，它會將建築從一個區域複製到另一個區域。
block.builder_pattern.flipaxis: 切換軸線（帶^為鏡像目標區的軸線）
block.builder_pattern.tooltip: 使用提供的材料將一個區域的構造複製到選定的另一區域
block.cyclic.clock.tooltip: 可以控制信號延遲和持續時間的紅石鐘
block.cyclic.clock.guide: The Redstone Clock emits a redstone signal with a configurable delay, length, and signal.$(br2)Useful for contraptions that need to work on a timer.
block.cyclic.detector_entity.tooltip: 檢測附近實體並輸出紅石信號
block.cyclic.detector_entity.guide: Detect entities nearby and outputs a redstone signal when detected. The detection range, type of entity, amount, and comparison type are configurable from its GUI.
block.cyclic.detector_item.tooltip: 檢測附近物品並輸出紅石信號
block.cyclic.detector_item.guide: Detect items nearby and outputs a redstone signal. The range and comparison method are configurable in its GUI.
block.cyclic.fire_dark.tooltip: 不會燒毀方塊和傷害玩家
block.cyclic.harvester.tooltip: 自動收穫和補種機器在工作範圍內的耕地作物
block.cyclic.harvester.guide: The Harvester will gently farm crops in an area in front of it, replanting the seeds (if any) after breaking the crop.
block.cyclic.magnet_anti_block.guide: 每隔幾個tick推一下怪物，直到推到作用範圍外（預設半徑34）。
block.cyclic.magnet_anti_block.tooltip: 每$t$tick以$r$格的半徑排斥一次怪物
block.cyclic.password_block.activetype.t: 在一直發出紅石信號和只發出一段紅石信號模式間切換
block.cyclic.password_block.guide: 基於口令觸發器的遠程紅石信號方塊。打開GUI並給它設定一個密碼，一旦你發送的聊天內容與你設定的密碼相同，紅石便會被觸發。如果觸發，密碼將不會在聊天中顯示，該觸發器將在發出紅石信號和不發出紅石信號的狀態之間切換。它還可以聲明所有權，設定誰可以觸發這個密碼。
block.cyclic.password_block.tooltip: 基於聊天欄口令密碼的無線紅石
block.cyclic.password_block.triggered: 口令觸發器已被觸發，聊天資訊已被取消：
block.cyclic.password_block.triggeredman: 個口令觸發器已被觸發，聊天資訊已被取消：
block.cyclic.password_block.userclaim.to: 只有觸發器的所有者才可以變更密碼
block.cyclic.password_block.usersallowed: 誰可以用口令激發這個方塊
block.cyclic.placer.guide: Places a block from its inventory in the direction it is facing.
block.cyclic.plate_launch.guide: The Bounce Plate Launches any entity that touches it into the air.
block.cyclic.plate_launch_redstone.toolt: 基於紅石能量值發射實體
block.cyclic.plate_launch_redstone.guide: The Bounce Plate Launches any entity that touches it into the air with magnitude that increases as the provided redstone signal increases.
block.cyclic.plate_push.tooltip: 推動一切實體，其速度為
block.cyclic.plate_vector.copied: 數據已經複製到方塊中
block.cyclic.plate_vector.guide: 發射在其上的實體。在其GUI中配置投射角度和彈射力度。當您破壞彈跳踏板時，會保存彈跳踏板中的數據。可以透過拿著彈跳踏板直接左鍵點擊在世界上的其他的彈跳踏板來複製內部的數據。
block.cyclic.plate_vector.tooltip.button: 偏角是水平朝向，投射仰角是垂直朝向，彈射力度則影響彈射距離
gui.cyclic.redstone1: 需要紅石信號才會工作
block.cyclic.spikes.guide: Spikes can be placed in the world in any orientation to damage creatures or players that touch them. Spikes are only extended when they receive a redstone signal.
block.cyclic.spikes_iron.tooltip: 通入紅石信號以啟動。這些釘子會傷害任何觸碰它們的實體
block.cyclic.spikes_fire.tooltip: 通入紅石信號以啟動，它會燒死觸碰的實體
block.cyclic.spikes_curse.tooltip: 通入紅石信號啟動，它會詛咒觸碰的實體
block.cyclic.spikes_curse.guide: Curses enemies with various negative effects on contact.
block.cyclic.sprinkler.empty: 在其下方放置水源，並放置在作物附近
block.cyclic.sprinkler.guide: 只有下方有水源存在才能執行。它會透過對附近的作物進行澆灌來增加作物生長速度。同一區域可以放置多個灑水器來疊加催熟效果。空手潛行右擊可以停用它的粒子密度。
block.cyclic.sprinkler.tooltip: 在其下方放置水源，然後放置在作物附近即可
block.cyclic.sprout.guide: 當收穫成熟的魔豆時，它會隨機地從事先客製化的掉落表中掉落一個物品（這個表會在配置檔案中列出）
block.cyclic.uncrafter.notenoughitems: Not enough items to satisfy recipe
block.cyclic.uncrafter.guide: This will lookup and reverse any vanilla 2x2 or 3x3 recipe.  May not work with specialized modded recipes / machine recipes.
block.cyclic.wireless_redstone.guide: The Wireless Redstone Transmitter and Receiver allow you to transmit redstone signals between distant points.$(br)Place a Wireless Receiver in the world and use a $(l:misc/location)GPS Marker$(/l) on it to store its coordinates. Then insert the GPS Marker into a Redstone Transmitter.$(br)Anytime the Transmitter receives a redstone signal, it will cause all linked Receivers to receive the same signal.
block.cyclic.wireless_transmitter.toolti: 傳送無線紅石信號到無線接收器，拿著它左擊無線接收器能夠記錄坐標
block.cyclic.wireless_receiver.tooltip: 從發信器接收一個無線紅石信號
unlocks.crafting: 物品欄工作檯升級已解鎖
unlocks.extended: 物品欄擴展升級已解鎖
locked.crafting: 物品欄工作檯升級未解鎖
locked.extended: 物品欄擴展升級未解鎖
toolcircle.swap: 在這裡存儲或交換物品
unlocks.stepheight.false: 自動走上一格高的方塊功能已停用
unlocks.stepheight.true: 自動走上一格高的方塊功能已啟用
wand.liquid.generic: 目前蒸發流體：普通流體
block.hydrator.locked.tooltip: 合成欄已被鎖定；物品最小堆疊數為 1
potion.butter.oops: 你獲得了笨拙效果！它生效時會在你移動時掉落背包物品。
item.minecraft.potion.effect.cyclic_hast: The Potion of Haste apples the Haste effect to the target, increasing their mining speed.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.cyclic_swim: The Potion of Swim Speed greatly increases its target's speed while moving through liquids.
item.minecraft.potion.effect.cyclic_stun: The Potion of Paralyze completely immobilizes its target.
block.cyclic.placer_fluid.guide: The Fluid Placer places fluid from its internal tank in the direction it is facing, if possible.
block.cyclic.pipe.guide.title: Cables
block.cyclic.pipe.guide: Types of cables can be used to transport fluids, items, or energy between machines. They can be configured using a $(l:items/cable_wrench)Cable Wrench$(/l).
block.cyclic.fluid_pipe.tooltip: 與流體泵連接即可傳輸流體
block.cyclic.fluid_pipe.guide: Pipe liquid between blocks; use a Cable Wrench to customize
block.cyclic.bundled_pipe.tooltip: 傳輸物品，流體以及能量
block.cyclic.energy_pipe.tooltip: 方塊之間的能量管道；使用電纜扳手自訂
block.cyclic.energy_pipe.guide: Pipe energy between blocks; use a Cable Wrench to customize
block.cyclic.item_pipe.tooltip: 快速傳輸物品，與物品泵協同使用
block.cyclic.item_pipe.guide: 使用物品泵從任意容器中抽取物品傳入管道，面朝玩家的麵輸入，後方圓形口輸出。可以使用紅石火把來調整輸出的方向。它會儘可能的將物品放入連接的容器中
block.cyclic.item_pipe_sort.tooltip: 用於管道或漏斗的分揀裝置
block.cyclic.item_pipe_sort.filter: 只有在與此過濾匹配時才會輸出
block.cyclic.item_pipe_sort.everything: 忽略過濾直接全部輸出
item.cyclic.biomass.guide: Combine with various organic material in a $(l:machines/melter)Melter$(/l) to create $(l:misc/fluid_biomass)Fluid Biomass$(/l)
item.cyclic.peat_fuel.tooltip: 熔煉好的泥炭，放入泥炭發電機以產生能量
item.cyclic.peat_fuel.guide: Peat Fuel is smelted from $(l:blocks/saturated_peat_bog)Saturated Peat Deposits$(/l) and used in the $(l:machines/peat_generator)Peat Generator$(/l) to generate energy.$(br2)It can also be combined with $(l:misc/fluid_biomass)Fluid Biomass$(/l) in a $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l) to create $(l:misc/peat_fuel_enriched)Enriched Peat$(/l).
item.cyclic.peat_fuel_enriched.tooltip: 放入泥炭發電機以產生能量
item.cyclic.peat_fuel_enriched.guide: Created by combining $(l:misc/peat_fuel)Peat$(/l) with $(l:misc/fluid_biomass)Fluid Biomass$(/l) in a $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l) and used to provide even more power in a $(l:machines/peat_generator)Peat Generator$(/l).
block.cyclic.peat_unbaked.tooltip: 放置在與水源臨近的地方就會慢慢變得濕潤
block.cyclic.peat_unbaked.guide: 放置在水源附近就會慢慢地變成濕潤的泥炭田。
block.cyclic.peat_baked.tooltip: 準備好被收穫和熔煉的濕潤泥炭田
block.cyclic.peat_baked.guide: 乾燥的泥炭田充分吸收水分後會變成濕潤的泥炭田。挖掘後會掉落泥炭。
block.cyclic.peat_generator.guide: 燃燒泥炭來產生能量。可以使用生物質團來製造泥炭燃料。
block.cyclic.peat_farm.guide: 放置和收穫泥炭田。需要能量和水。
block.cyclic.miner.tooltip: Mines a configurable area in front of the Miner
block.cyclic.miner.guide: Mines a configurable area in front of the Miner. Will attempt to mine with any tool you provide it.
block.cyclic.forester.guide: The Forester will attempt to place spalings in the area in front of itself, and harvest them when the saplings grow into trees.
block.cyclic.dropper.guide: Drops blocks from its internal buffer at a configurable stack size, distance, and delay.
cable.block.toggled.false: 已恢復管道連接，方向為
cable.block.toggled.true: 已阻斷管道連接，方向為
block.cyclic.battery.guide: Stores Forge Energy (FE) to be used in machines. Power can be transferred to and from the battery via $(l:machines/pipe)cables$(/l) or by placing machines directly adjacent to the battery.
block.cyclic.battery_infinite.tooltip: 創造模式下的能量來源
block.fire_dark.guide: 不會破壞方塊或傷害玩家。可由黃昏魔杖生成
block.target.tooltip: 根據箭射中靶子的環數來發射紅石信號
block.target.guide: 根據箭射中靶子的環數來發射紅石信號，只能在射中該方塊的側面時才能工作。
block.moon_sensor.tooltip: 會根據目前月相來發射紅石信號
block.moon_sensor.guide: 會根據目前月相來發射紅石信號，可能的紅石信號強度為1、3、5、7、9、11、13、15，在達到最大值後它會隨著月球位相的改變而再次減弱。白天時會保持弱充能，到晚上時紅石信號強度會隨著月球位相的改變而改變。
item.robot_spawner.tooltip: [實驗性特性]透過它生成一個計數機器人來測量玩家造成的傷害
item.robot_spawner.guide: 透過它來生成一個測量玩家造成傷害的計數機器人，它可以透過給予護甲來減少傷害（死亡後會掉落）。計數機器人不會攻擊和移動，要移除它，你可以殺死或用計數機器人生成器再次點擊它。
block.doorbell_simple.guide: 當你點擊它時會播放一次聲音
block.fire_starter.tooltip: 使用能量來在方塊面向的直線方向上生火
block.fire_starter.guide: 使用燧石來在通入紅石信號時生火。能面向任何方向。有機率消耗燧石。
block.fire_frost.tooltip: 間歇地給予少量傷害和緩慢、虛弱效果
block.fire_frost.guide: 間歇地給予少量傷害和緩慢、虛弱效果
block.sound_player.tooltip: 它幾乎能播放所有聲音
block.sound_player.guide: 它幾乎能播放所有的非錄製聲音（可透過紅石信號控制）。重複播放時請小心，因為它們可能會重疊在一起。
item.sign_editor.tooltip: 編輯告示牌的內容、顏色和字體樣式
item.sign_editor.guide: 編輯告示牌的內容、顏色和字體樣式。保存到告示牌的數據與原版完全相容，並與指令方塊設定告示牌顏色時的NBT標籤完全相同。
gui.signs.title: 告示牌自訂
block.cyclic.dice.guide: When placed or clicked, the Dice will roll and show a new random number from 1-6.
item.laser_cannon.tooltip: 隨機地發射任意顏色的光束
item.laser_cannon.guide: 隨機地發射任意顏色的光束
block.imbuer.tooltip: 能給你的弓注入神秘的力量
block.imbuer.guide: 能給你的弓注入神秘的力量。放入弓和對應的材料，然後通入紅石信號即可。在其內部為空的時候潛行右擊可以查看有效的合成。
item.slingshot_weapon.guide: 它能像弓那樣蓄力，並發射你物品欄中的石子。礦物詞典中匹配為"rock"的所有物品都可以作為彈藥使用。
item.cyclic.netherbrick_gear.guide.title: Nether Gear
item.cyclic.netherbrick_gear.guide: Nether gear is slightly stronger than Stone gear.
wireless.target: 檢測到的目標方塊名稱
wireless.empty: 請先用GPS標記器標記要傳輸到的節點位置，然後放入上方格子即可
chest_sack.error.pickup: 在存儲時遇到了一個錯誤——動作已被撤銷（查看日誌以獲知更多資訊）
chest_sack.error.place: 在放置時遇到了一個錯誤——動作已被撤銷（查看日誌以獲知更多資訊）
block.auto_packager.tooltip: 支持自訂合成的打包機
block.auto_packager.guide: 能將類似於鐵錠和金錠的物品打包成塊，支持使用 CraftTweaker 加入的自訂合成。
block.dehydrator.tooltip: 正如其名，能進行脫水的合成
block.dehydrator.guide: 對特定物品進行脫水，可使用 CraftTweaker 來加入更多合成。可加入岩漿以加快脫水速度。
item.cyclic.shears_obsidian.guide: Obsidian Shears are like regular shears... but they last longer. A lot longer.
item.cyclic.shears_flint.guide: Flint Shears break more quickly than regular shears, but they are easier to craft in the early-game.
item.cyclic.boomerang.guide.title: Boomerang
item.cyclic.boomerang.guide: Boomerangs are a multipurpose tool for gathering items. Simply hold it in your hand, lock on, and throw! If any items are along its path, they will be picked up and brought to the thrower.
item.cyclic.boomerang_carry.tooltip: 丟出以取得那些會到你手裡的物品。
item.cyclic.boomerang_carry.guide: Throw to gather items that it returns to you
item.cyclic.boomerang_stun.tooltip: 取得物品並擊暈你的敵人
item.cyclic.boomerang_stun.guide: Gathers items and stun your enemies
item.cyclic.boomerang_damage.tooltip: 取得物品並攻擊你的敵人
item.cyclic.boomerang_damage.guide: Gathers items and attacks your enemies
block.cyclic.laser.guide: Use GPS Markers to target lasers and heavily customize their appearance.
block.water_candle.tooltip: 提升附近的生物生成率
block.water_candle.guide: 使用打火石以點燃。它能大幅提升附近生物的生成率，並且遵循生物和生態域的正常生成規則。每次生成它都有機會自動熄滅。可在配置檔案中設定更多選項。
block.cyclic.fireplace.tooltip: Light a fire when powered, extinguish when not powered.
block.cyclic.fireplace.guide: Lights a neverending fire on its netherrack face when powered by redstone. Extinguishes the fire when not powered.
extended.toolbelt: 鍵可以在未打開物品欄時開啟它
item.cyclic.gem.guide.title: Gems
item.cyclic.gem_obsidian.guide: Gems are created in the $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l). They are used as a crafting material in many things
item.cyclic.gem_amber.guide: Amber Gems are created in the $(l:machines/solidifier)Solidification Chamber$(/l).  They are used as a crafting material in many things
block.cyclic.collector_fluid.tooltip: 排空附近和下方的液體，用方塊填充
block.cyclic.collector_fluid.guide: 排空附近和下方的液體，用方塊填充
block.cyclic.melter.tooltip: 把某些東西融化成液體
block.cyclic.melter.guide: The Melter, as its name implies, melts ingredients into various liquids using energy.
block.cyclic.mason_stone.guide.title: Mason Blocks
block.cyclic.mason_stone.guide: Mason blocks are a decorative block and a crafting ingredient for various machines.
block.cyclic.solidifier.guide: The Solidifier combines various fluids and ingredients to solidify them into something else, usually to make new crafting ingredients.
